title: D1 ADC Looking for team
body:
Recently i really got  the urge to play competetive and as i researched it is pretty hard to get into the amateur  scene as a nobody so im creating this post in hope to find somebody who has interest in picking up a new player.
Hit me up ingame ign:D5 Scuba Dive

replies.body:
Are you already looking for a team who wanna be in competitive Tournaments in future ? 
Cuz im looking to build one up ... and searching skilled player for that.

To my person, im playing this game since early season 3 with some breaks ... but in near future im looking for a real active Team.
